DOC.brief_summary: This 48-week extension study CMA-0631-PR-0010 Core Study . Patients positive culture P. aeruginosa visit 4 first 8-week core study period and/or deem appropriate Investigators able include 48-week follow-on period ( Extension Study ) continue treatment Bramitob® ( tobramycin nebuliser solution , 300 mg twice daily 4 mL unit dose vial ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Single Arm 48-Week Follow-on Safety Study Core Study Comparing Efficacy Tolerability Tobrineb®/Actitob®/Bramitob® Versus TOBI®
DOC.criteria: Successful completion Core Study At least 6 year age Males female
